price: (26) And the example of a bad word is like a bad tree, uprooted from the surface of the earth, not having any stability.
arabic: وَمَثَلُ كَلِمَةٍ خَبِيثَةٖ كَشَجَرَةٍ خَبِيثَةٍ ٱجۡتُثَّتۡ مِن فَوۡقِ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مَا لَهَا مِن قَرَارٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wamathalu kalimatin khabīthatin kashajaratin khabīthatin uj'tuthat min fawqi al-arḍi mā lahā min qarārin
